mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store_tbl (sellerCode, storeName, storeCategory, storeImage, storeAddress, storePhone, minOrderPrice, deliveryFee, deliveryArea) VALUES (#{sellerCode}, #{storeName}, #{storeCategory}, #{storeImage}, #{storeAddress}, #{storePhone}, #{minOrderPrice}, #{deliveryFee}, #{deliveryArea})
mapper.update: UPDATE store_tbl SET storeName = #{storeName}, storeCategory = #{storeCategory}, storeImage = #{storeImage}, storeAddress = #{storeAddress}, storePhone = #{storePhone}, minOrderPrice = #{minOrderPrice}, deliveryFee = #{deliveryFee}, deliveryArea = #{deliveryArea}, storeStatus = #{storeStatus} WHERE storeCode = #{storeCode}
